name: Lola - The Escape [Demo]
description:
Cute platformer in which you help a the little cow Lola to escape from her captors,.. the Martians.

Adventure game in which little Lola has the ability to float while falling if you hold the jump button. In your adventure you will find many challenges and mysteries related to the second part of this game, ... A Metroidvania style game.

I love the PixelArt

⚠️ This is a game in constant development. It is planned to be published in April. The complete project has 36 levels on 6 maps.

⚠️ This Demo has no sound or music effects. In the next update you can already hear something. This Demo only has one Level and the challenge is to find the 3 stars. The Demo does not record the achievements at the moment.

⚠️ Wait for the update of this demo with more levels and sound.

I will appreciate your comments, observations or advice that will help me better this game. Thanks a lot.
